# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

::: {.cable-meta}
:::


1. VIEWS EXPRESSED BY US DEL LOS IN REFTEL A, TOGETHER WITH
CONSIDERATIONS NOTED BY EMBASSY LA PAZ IN REFTEL B, APPEAR TO
PROVIDE CONCLUSIVE ARGUMENTS AGAINST VISIT BY PROFESSOR COCHRAN
TO BOLIVIA TO ATTEND CONFERENCE ON LOS-RELEATED SUBJECTS.
EMBASSY WOULD THEREFORE APPRECIATE DEPARTMENT'S INFORMING PROFESSOR
COCHRAN THAT COUNTRY CLEARANCE NOT REPEAT NOT GRANTED FOR HIS
VISIT.
STEDMAN
